text: now doctors in Vietnam are treating a
man and his son who have been living
wild in the jungle for the last 40 years
ho van tan fled with his two-year-old
son Lang when his wife and two other
children were killed by a mine explosion
during that the Vietnam War they have
survived in complete isolation living on
fruit and corn officials at the hospital
where they're being treated have told
the BBC the two men don't want to be
part of civilization I want to return to
